name.narrative: Headquartered in Santo Domingo, CEPM owns and operates the power generation and distribution lines serving the Bavaro and Punta Cana area in the eastern part of the country and the power generation and distribution assets serving the Bayahibe area in the southeastern part of the country. CEPMs assets include 18 power generating units of 56 MW of total installed capacity, two substations and 14 km. of 69 kV lines and about 200 km. of 12.5 kV and lower voltage lines. CEBs assets include six power generating units of 13 MW of total installed capacity and 25 km. of medium voltage lines and 8 km. of low voltage lines.
